workshoptitle: Simple Data Driven applications using JavaScript in Oracle Database 23ai

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Simple Data Driven applications using JavaScript workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Get started with JavaScript development using a community module
tutorials.description: Set up your environment and implement the validator.js module in your application

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create JavaScript modules and environments
tutorials.description: Learn more about creating JavaScript modules and environments

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Declare JavaScript functions
tutorials.description: Learn how to expose JavaScript code in SQL and PL/SQL

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Interact with the database using the JavaScript SQL Driver
tutorials.description: Learn how to access schema objects using the JavaScript SQL Driver

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Work effectively with JSON
tutorials.description: Learn how to work with JSON using a document model

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Get insights into your code using Post-Execution Debugging
tutorials.description: Learn how to use Post-Execution debugging for JavaScript modules

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Instructions for setup, tear-down and backup
tutorials.description: Learn how to configure the lab, tear it down, and back up your progress
